item.title: Air Jordan 1 Mid
item.dc:creator: zeelpatel
item.description:
The Air Jordan 1 Mid brings full-court style and premium comfort to an iconic look. Its Air-Sole unit cushions play on the hardwood, while the padded collar gives you a supportive feel.

  • Colour Shown: Sail/Blue Grey/White/Diffused Blue
  • Style: BQ6472-140

The post Air Jordan 1 Mid appeared first on .
item.content:encoded:
HERITAGE STYLE, PREMIUM COMFORT ON AND OFF THE COURT.

 

The Air Jordan 1 Mid brings full-court style and premium comfort to an iconic look. Its Air-Sole unit cushions play on the hardwood, while the padded collar gives you a supportive feel.

 

Benefits

  • Premium leather and synthetic upper provides durability, comfort and support.
  • Air-Sole unit in the heel delivers signature cushioning.
  • Rubber outsole offers traction on a variety of surfaces.
  • Colour Shown: Sail/Blue Grey/White/Diffused Blue
  • Style: BQ6472-140
  • Country/Region of Origin: Vietnam

The post Air Jordan 1 Mid appeared first on .

item.title: Air Jordan 1 High Method of Make
item.dc:creator: zeelpatel
item.description:
Your style is iconic and your taste is next level. Show it off with the Method of Make series—limited, elevated iterations of legendary sneakers. Soft-touch textiles on the tongue and underlays give this AJ1 a tactile luxury. The unlined toe box puts an emphasis on deconstructed comfort. Take another look and you'll notice the exaggerated proportions, visually setting your Js apart from the rest. Get ready to get noticed.

  • Colour Shown: Legend Medium Brown/Legend Coffee/Legend Light Brown/Legend Dark Brown
  • Style: FB9891-200

The post Air Jordan 1 High Method of Make appeared first on .
item.content:encoded:
Your style is iconic and your taste is next level. Show it off with the Method of Make series—limited, elevated iterations of legendary sneakers. Soft-touch textiles on the tongue and underlays give this AJ1 a tactile luxury. The unlined toe box puts an emphasis on deconstructed comfort. Take another look and you’ll notice the exaggerated proportions, visually setting your Js apart from the rest. Get ready to get noticed.

 

Deconstructed comfort

Soft-touch textiles and an unlined, deconstructed toe box keep these Js comfortable and flexible, while lending a distinctive look to the silhouette.

 

Elevated classic

While the upper features exaggerated overlays, deconstructed design elements and a larger Swoosh, this pair retains the original AJ1 tooling from the toe down, keeping your look grounded in heritage style.

The post Air Jordan 1 High Method of Make appeared first on .

item.title: Air Jordan 1 Low SE Lunar New Year
item.dc:creator: zeelpatel
item.description:
Start the Year of the Dragon in style. This elegant AJ1 has a textured Swoosh logo inspired by the Chinese Zodiac's only mythological creature. Details like the metallic embroidered Jumpman on the tongue and satin collar lining bring a hint of shine to the celebration. And don't forget to open your red envelope—a good luck Jumpman charm is included with every pair.

  • Colour Shown: Sail/Dark Team Red/Dark Smoke Grey/Metallic Gold Grain
  • Style: FJ5735-100

The post Air Jordan 1 Low SE Lunar New Year appeared first on .
item.content:encoded:
Start the Year of the Dragon in style. This elegant AJ1 has a textured Swoosh logo inspired by the Chinese Zodiac’s only mythological creature. Details like the metallic embroidered Jumpman on the tongue and satin collar lining bring a hint of shine to the celebration. And don’t forget to open your red envelope—a good luck Jumpman charm is included with every pair.

 

Benefits

  • Leather in the upper offers durability and structure.
  • Nike Air-Sole unit provides lightweight cushioning.
  • Rubber in the outsole gives you everyday traction.
  • Colour Shown: Sail/Dark Team Red/Dark Smoke Grey/Metallic Gold Grain
  • Style: FJ5735-100
  • Country/Region of Origin: China

The post Air Jordan 1 Low SE Lunar New Year appeared first on .

item.title: Air Jordan 1 Low G
item.dc:creator: zeelpatel
item.description:
Feel unbeatable, from the tee box to the final putt. Inspired by one of the most iconic sneakers of all time, the Air Jordan 1 G is an instant classic on the course. With Air cushioning underfoot, a Wings logo on the heel and an integrated traction pattern to help you power through your swing, it delivers all the clubhouse cool of the original AJ1—plus everything you need to play 18 holes in comfort.

  • Colour Shown: White/Varsity Red/Obsidian
  • Style: DD9315-113

The post Air Jordan 1 Low G appeared first on .
item.content:encoded:
AN ’85 ICON REMADE FOR THE COURSE.

 

Feel unbeatable, from the tee box to the final putt. Inspired by one of the most iconic sneakers of all time, the Air Jordan 1 G is an instant classic on the course. With Air cushioning underfoot, a Wings logo on the heel and an integrated traction pattern to help you power through your swing, it delivers all the clubhouse cool of the original AJ1—plus everything you need to play 18 holes in comfort.

 

Stitch-for-Stitch Construction

Genuine leather and bold colour-blocking recreate the classic look.

 

Air Cushioning

Encapsulated Air in the heel cushions every step.

 

Heritage Traction

Based on the design of the original outsole, the integrated traction pattern includes a forefoot pivot circle.

 

Product Details

  • One-year waterproof warranty
  • Colour Shown: White/Varsity Red/Obsidian
  • Style: DD9315-113
  • Country/Region of Origin: China

The post Air Jordan 1 Low G appeared first on .

item.title: Jordan Stadium 90
item.dc:creator: zeelpatel
item.description:
You're fearless. It's in your DNA. Celebrate what defines you in the Stadium 90, a new classic made for durability and comfort. Tapping into Jordan Brand heritage, it combines iconic design elements from the AJ1 and AJ5 (check out the moulded collar and tonal stitching) with a modern build and premium cushioning.

  • Colour Shown: Pale Vanilla/Coconut Milk/Tour Yellow/Yellow Ochre
  • Style: FN0584-200

The post Jordan Stadium 90 appeared first on .
item.content:encoded:
You’re fearless. It’s in your DNA. Celebrate what defines you in the Stadium 90, a new classic made for durability and comfort. Tapping into Jordan Brand heritage, it combines iconic design elements from the AJ1 and AJ5 (check out the moulded collar and tonal stitching) with a modern build and premium cushioning.

 

Benefits

  • The moulded collar is inspired by the AJ5 and the outsole nods to the AJ1.
  • A tonal stitching design detail echoes the iconic fire graphic from the AJ5.
  • Durable upper is made from real leather, synthetic leather and textile materials.
  • Nike Air technology absorbs impact for cushioning with every step.
  • Colour Shown: Pale Vanilla/Coconut Milk/Tour Yellow/Yellow Ochre
  • Style: FN0584-200
  • Country/Region of Origin: Vietnam

The post Jordan Stadium 90 appeared first on .
